title: Panthers relied on Marchand's 'magic' in Cup run

content: Rafael Le√£o, Nico Williams, Bradley Barcola and Eberechi Eze are among Bayern Munich's potential targets, sources told ESPN.

content: Sixteen months ago, Scot Pollard was in active heart failure, about to die. Then came a lifesaving transplant, uniting two families -- and two fathers -- forever. Watch E60's "Heart of Pearl" at 1 p.m. ET on ESPN.

content: The Vatican on Wednesday unveiled a fundraising video centred on newly elected Pope Leo, urging the faithful to support his mission amid a serious financial crisis for the Catholic Church.

content: After warnings, ultimatums, and even a death threat by Israel's Netanyahu and US President Donald Trump, Iran's Supreme Leader has spoken.

title: Warnings, Cops Outside Houses: Karnataka Takes Steps For 'Thug Life' Release
content: In the wake of strong observations made by the Supreme Court in favour of allowing the release of 'Thug Life', the Karnataka government has begun tightening enforcement across the state to ensure there are no disruptions.

title: Israel Kills 30 In Gaza, Including Aid Seekers, Amid Iran Conflict: Health Authorities
content: Israeli gunfire and strikes killed at least 30 people across the Gaza Strip on Wednesday, local health authorities said, as some Palestinians there said their plight was being forgotten as attention shifted to the air war between Israel and Iran.

title: Bhopal Bridge With 90-Degree Turn To Be Redesigned After Memes Go Viral
content: A rail overbridge that presented a disaster in waiting in Madhya Pradesh's Bhopal will be redesigned, the authorities have said.

content: Vladimir Putin is eyeing the conflict between Israel and Iran as an opportunity to thrust himself to the forefront of the international stage, more than three years into his invasion of Ukraine.

title: "You Are The Best, Trying To Be As You": Italy PM Meloni Tells PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Italian counterpart, Giorgia Meloni, met on the sidelines of the G7 summit in Canada.

title: Telangana Congress Chief Accuses KCR, KTR Of Tapping Party Leaders' Phones
content: Telangana Congress chief Mahesh Kumar Goud said former chief minister K Chandrasekhar Rao and his son KT Rama Rao were responsible for tapping the phones of hundreds of Congress leaders.

title: A Look At Israel's Nuclear Program As It Attacks Iran For Wanting One
content: While Israel launched a war against Iran, saying it aims to prevent Tehran from acquiring a nuclear weapon -- a charge Iran denies-- Jerusalem may be hiding a few scaletons in its closet.

title: How Khamenei Is Losing Inner Circle In Israeli Strike As Iran's Axis Weakens
content: The deaths of IRGC Commander-in-Chief Hossein Salami, aerospace chief Amir Ali Hajizadeh, intelligence head Mohammad Kazemi, and armed forces chief Mohammad Bagheri, among others, have stunned Tehran's political and military elite.

title: Video: Shirtless Men Hang Out Of Car, Harass Woman Biker On Haridwar Highway
content: A woman biker was sexually harassed by a couple of shirtless men while she was on her way to Uttarakhand last week.

title: 17-Year-Old Girl Found Hanging In Odisha, Rape-Murder Suspected
content: After the gang-rape of a college student in Odisha's Gopalpur on Sunday, another shocking crime has been reported from the state, this time in Keonjhar district. A 17-year-old girl was found hanging after she was allegedly sexually assaulted.

title: Uber's Middle East Unit Careem To Suspend Decade-Old Service In Pakistan
content: Careem, Uber's ride-hailing arm in the Middle East, will suspend its Pakistan service on July 18, citing economic challenges, rising competition, and capital constraints, ending its core business in a country where it helped pioneer app-based transpo

title: FASTag Annual Pass: Price, Start Date, Benefits And How To Apply Online
content: The Centre is introducing a FASTag-based annual pass priced at Rs 3,000 for non-commercial private vehicles.

title: Musk's xAI Burns Through $1 Billion A Month As Costs Pile Up
content: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI is burning through $1 billion a month as the cost of building its advanced AI models races ahead of the limited revenues.

title: Sonam Raghuvanshi's 3 Mobile Phones And A WhatsApp "Mistake"
content: The police got a major breakthrough in the Meghalaya honeymoon murder case after the newly married Indore woman, Sonam, who along with three hitmen murdered her husband, decided to check her WhatsApp messages and turned on data connection.

title: Impact of Devers trade on prospects
content: new San Francisco Giants 3B/DH Rafael Devers was the best player involved in the sport-shaking, Sunday night blockbuster trade with the Boston Red Sox . the 22-year-old outfield prospect is a smooth, left-handed slugger from Florida State with big power potential and excellent plate discipline . neither fans nor fantasy managers are likely to see Tibbs in the major leagues this season .

title: Ranking Elite 11 quarterbacks by system fit: Who could thrive at the next level
content: the elite 11 finals annually spotlight the nation's top high school quarterbacks . there's a clear trend emerging in Knoxville when it comes to quarterback traits in terms of stature, athleticism and arm strength . here are the top 10 committed quarterbacks attending the event later this month .

title: NFL execs, scouts pick their favorite offseason moves: Where Rodgers, Pickens rate
content: twenty-eight teams are officially off for the summer, with the frenzied nature of transactions fading into the background . this week's minicamp is the ideal time to take stock of the splash moves around the league . a few potential moves remain on the radar, including a potential Jalen Ramsey trade .

title: From transfers to training, Man City are taking Club World Cup seriously
content: man city boss pep Guardiola says he has "closed a chapter" in the club world cup . the last remaining piece of silverware was safely tucked away in the trophy cabinet . it's been 18 months since Guardiola's emotional speech in jeddah .

title: Why the Panthers are the nicest 'rats' to win the Stanley Cup (twice)
content: the Florida Panthers defeat the Edmonton Oilers 5-1 to become back-to-back Stanley Cup champions . they're the most antagonistic trash-talking bullies in the national hockey league . opponents decry their actions and fans outright loathe them .

title: Five takeaways from J.J. McCarthy's offseason as Vikings' expected starting QB
content: the world has no shortage of opinions on quarterback J.J. McCarthy . he's not ready to lead the Vikings to super bowl lX in february . "they've really pushed the limits on just what I can handle," he says .

title: Shaquille O'Neal to join WWE 2K25 roster with Tyrese Haliburton
content: The next DLC pack for WWE 2K25 is just over a week away, and the second of the mystery NBA stars being added to the game has been revealed. Shaquille O'Neal will join  Tyrese Haliburton  in the "Dunk & Destruction Pack." Shaq has had a lot of involvement in the pro-wrestling world over the years. Back in 2016, he was a surprise competitor at WrestleMania 32's Andre the Giant Memorial Battle Royal, where his massive 7-foot-1 frame stood up to the equally huge Big Show. Then in 2021, Shaq turned to AEW, competing in a tag team match with the then-debuting Jade Cargill against company founder Cody Rhodes and Red Velvet. Alongside Shaq, Haliburton and the one NBA star yet to be announced, this DLC pack features The Great Khali, a former world champion in WWE, and Abyss, a former TNA wrestler who now works as a backstage producer for WWE. It is scheduled to release on June 25, 2025.

title: 2025 NBA Finals: Williams drops 40 to put Thunder one win away from title
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder dominated the majority of Game 1 of the NBA Finals . the Thunder led by as many as 18 points but held just a 95-93 edge after Pascal Siakam . but instead of letting the game slip away, Oklahoma City delivered its latest knockout blow .

title: Iran ‚Äòwill never surrender‚Äô: Khamenei warns US of 'irreparable damage' if it intervenes; says Israel will be punished
content: Amid escalating Middle East tensions, Iran's Ayatollah Khamenei warned the US against intervention in the ongoing conflict with Israel, threatening ‚Äúirreparable damage.‚Äù This follows a fierce aerial war and inflammatory remarks by US President Trump. Iran claimed to have launched hypersonic missiles at Israel, marking a regional first.

title: Honeymoon murder: How Sonam hid in 'secret' Indore flat; broke phones, dumped SIMs
content: A Shillong police team investigated an Indore flat where Sonam Raghuvanshi allegedly stayed after her husband's murder in Meghalaya. The search aimed to verify information from five suspects and gather evidence. Sonam, who disappeared after the May 23rd murder, reportedly fled to Indore around May 25-27, where her lover had arranged accommodation for her.

title: 'Islamic Republic has reached its end': Exiled royal urges uprising in Iran
content: Reza Pahlavi, the exiled Iranian prince, has passionately called upon Iran's military, police, and state employees to join a nationwide uprising against the current Islamic Republic, asserting that its collapse is imminent. His appeal follows Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's strong endorsement of regime change in Iran, highlighting widespread dissent and suggesting the regime's days are numbered.

title: IND vs ENG: When was the first time ‚ÄòIndian‚Äô cricket team crossed the Atlantic?
content: In the summer of 1911, an Indian cricket team, led by the young Maharaja Bhupinder Singh and featuring the remarkable Palwankar Baloo, embarked on their first tour of England. Despite facing seasoned English players and challenging conditions, the team, a diverse mix of Parsis, Hindus, Muslims, and Sikhs, managed to secure six wins in twenty-three first-class matches.

title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos-Sanchez wedding: Venice Mayor says 'I am ashamed'
content: Jeff Bezos's upcoming Venice wedding has sparked controversy, dividing residents. While city officials, like Mayor Luigi Brugnaro, welcome the event for its economic benefits and visibility, some locals protest, expressing resentment towards the mega-wedding. The "No Space for Bezos" collective voiced their opposition, highlighting the city's struggle to balance its historical identity with modern tourism.

title: Canada's BC premier seeks terror tag for Lawrence Bishnoi gang
content: British Columbia's Premier David Eby is set to request Prime Minister Mark Carney to designate the Lawrence Bishnoi gang as a terrorist organization, citing links to extortion and crimes against the South Asian community. This demand comes amid PM Modi's visit to Canada, where he met with Carney to discuss strengthening ties and addressing transnational issues like terrorism.

title: FASTag annual pass: How to purchase, validity, cost, trip limit & more - Top 15 FAQs answered
content: Starting August 15th, 2025, FASTag users can purchase an Annual Pass for ‚Çπ3,000, allowing unlimited passage for private cars, jeeps, and vans on designated National Highways and Expressways. The pass is valid for one year or 200 trips, whichever is earlier, and is available through the Rajmargyatra app or NHAI website. We answer the key FAQs:

title: IND v ENG: 'Rohit won't be missed as much as Virat'; Boycott urges hosts to use 'brain'
content: Geoffrey Boycott believes Virat Kohli's Test retirement is a bigger blow to India than Rohit Sharma's, citing Kohli's consistent performance and talismanic presence. Boycott urges England to temper their "Bazball" approach, emphasizing the importance of winning over entertaining, especially against a transitioning Indian team. He cautions England against overconfidence despite their recent win.

title: Steve Jobs‚Äô expensive gift: When Apple founder gifted Jaguar to secretary; said ‚Äòdon‚Äôt be‚Ä¶‚Äô
content: Steve Jobs, known for his demanding leadership, once gifted a late secretary a Jaguar to prevent future tardiness, showcasing his paradoxical nature of being both intimidating and inspiring. Ron Givens, Apple's former quality director, shared anecdotes of Jobs' unexpected generosity and relentless pursuit of excellence. Jobs' high expectations extended to late-night calls, as recalled by Pixar's Pete Docter.

title: Champions SA return home: Thousands welcome WTC-winning Proteas - Watch
content: South Africa's cricket team received a hero's welcome in Johannesburg after their World Test Championship victory, their first major ICC trophy since 1998. Aiden Markram's century and Kagiso Rabada's nine wickets were crucial in the win against Australia. Looking forward, a new-look Proteas squad, including uncapped players, will face Zimbabwe in a two-Test series.

title: 'Escaped bombs, but now I‚Äôm stuck at border': Indian tourist trapped in war-hit Iran
content: Falguni Dey, a professor from Kolkata, is stuck at the Iran-Azerbaijan border. He escaped Tehran after airstrikes, hoping to reach Baku. Azerbaijan requires a special migration code, delaying his journey. Dey is facing emotional and financial strain. Indian officials are assisting him. He is considering an alternate route via Armenia. Strangers and officials are providing support to him.

title: Boeing crisis: Elon Musk hints too many managers may be the issue; says that's where problem lies
content: Following the Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner crash in Ahmedabad, which killed 241 passengers and crew, safety concerns have risen. A resurfaced tweet from Elon Musk criticizing Boeing's management has added fuel to the fire. The DGCA has ordered enhanced safety inspections for Air India's Dreamliner fleet.

title: Is Israel running out of missiles? Report claims defence system nearing breaking point
content: Amidst escalating conflict, a report indicates Israel's Arrow missile interceptor stock may be dwindling, prompting US support with additional defense systems. Israel has launched attacks on Tehran, targeting military production sites, while intercepting drones launched from Iran. The crisis intensifies with threats from Iran's leader and potential US involvement, impacting civil aviation and regional stability.

title: FASTag-based annual pass announced! Eligibility, validity and more details
content: Starting August 15, 2025, a ‚Çπ3,000 FASTag-based Annual Pass will be available for private vehicles like cars, jeeps, and vans. Valid for one year or 200 trips, this pass streamlines toll payments on National Highways across India.

title: Kedarnath trek horror: 2 dead as landslide strikes Junglechatti; rescue ops on
content: A devastating landslide struck the Kedarnath trek route near Junglechatti ghat, resulting in the immediate deaths of two people and injuries to three others. The victims, including pilgrims and palanquin operators, were hit by falling boulders and knocked into a gorge.

title: ‚ÄòShe‚Äôs his secret weapon‚Äô: Taylor Swift could fuel Chiefs' next Super Bowl win
content: Pat McAfee suggests Travis Kelce's relationship with Taylor Swift could be fueling his performance, potentially boosting the Kansas City Chiefs' chances for another Super Bowl run. McAfee believes Swift's influence extends beyond media attention, acting as a motivational force for Kelce to elevate his game. This connection could sharpen the team's focus and unity, making them even more formidable contenders.

title: Mysuru mishap: Many students injured as school van overturns; admitted to hospital
content: A school van accident near Habbanakuppe village in Mysuru injured eleven students on Wednesday. The van, carrying twelve students from MR Noble English Medium school, overturned after its axle reportedly broke. All injured students were rushed to Cheluvamba Hospital; most are stable, though five underwent CT scans. The driver sustained a forehead injury, and a student received stitches.

title: Bigg Boss 17‚Äôs Mannara Chopra breaks down in tears at her father‚Äôs funeral
content: Mannara Chopra is mourning the loss of her father, Advocate Raman Rai Handa, who passed away on June 16, 2025, in Mumbai. The actress, along with her sister Mitali and mother, performed the last rites at the crematorium. Mannara shared the news on Instagram, remembering her father as a pillar of strength.

title: Who was Luis Guevara? Orioles' young star dies in tragic accident at 19
content: Orioles' rising baseball player, Luis Guevara, tragically died in a jet ski accident in Florida at the young age of 19. Guevara, an infielder from Venezuela, showed great promise in the minor leagues, with a .281 batting average and a .420 on-base percentage. The Orioles organization and his teammates are mourning the loss of a kind, humble, and hardworking player.

title: EXCLUSIVE | IND vs ENG: 'Gambhir, not Gill, will be in the spotlight'
content: TimesofIndia.com caught up with former England spinner Monty Panesar, who played 50 Tests and took 167 wickets, for an in-depth chat about Gambhir‚Äôs big challenge, India‚Äôs new captain Shubman Gill, the team‚Äôs prospects in England, Kuldeep Yadav‚Äôs potential impact, and more.

title: AI 171 crash probe widens: Ahmedabad airport ground staff quizzed; sabotage angle not ruled out
content: A multi-agency investigation is underway at Ahmedabad's SVPI Airport following the Air India AI 171 crash, which killed 241. Ground handling agencies are under scrutiny, with staff questioned and phones seized. The probe, involving AAIB, Gujarat Police, AAI, DGCA, and the NTSB, seeks to determine the cause, including potential sabotage.

title: Exclusive | 'Why would I come to India if Bangladesh had chess tournaments?': 80-yo Rani Hamid
content: In a captivating encounter at the Delhi International GM Open Chess Tournament 2025, 80-year-old Rani Hamid, a Bangladeshi chess legend, faced 13-year-old prodigy Balaji Sudarshan. Despite a recent string of losses, Hamid's spirit remained undeterred. Sudarshan's skill led to Hamid's defeat, but the two engaged in a post-game analysis, transcending their age gap through their shared passion for chess.

title: UP shocker: Dad performs last rites of ‚Äòdaughter‚Äô, later finds her alive with ‚Äòlover‚Äô
content: A Hamirpur man's grief turned to shock. He identified a body as his missing daughter and performed her last rites. Police later found the daughter alive with her alleged lover. The father had mistakenly identified the body. Now, police are investigating the identity of the deceased woman. They are contacting nearby districts to find missing persons matching her description.

title: IND vs ENG | 1st Test predicted playing XI: Sudharsan or Easwaran
content: IND vs ENG 1st Test predicted playing XI: India‚Äôs five-Test tour of England, beginning on June 20 in Leeds, marks the dawn of a new chapter. With stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma having retired from Test cricket, a fresh-faced squad under Shubman Gill‚Äôs captaincy is ready to prove its mettle in one of the game‚Äôs toughest conditions.

title: Cricket news: Bombay HC rules in favour of Kochi Tuskers, upholds Rs 538 crore arbitral award against BCCI
content: The Bombay High Court has upheld arbitral awards exceeding Rs 538 crore in favour of the defunct Kochi Tuskers IPL franchise, dismissing BCCI's challenge. Justice Chagla emphasised the limited scope of court intervention in arbitration matters. Kochi Tuskers had played the 2011 season of the IPL before being terminated a year later.

title: Why PM Modi turned down Trump's invite to meet in US
content: Following the G7 Summit in Canada, US President Donald Trump invited Prime Minister Narendra Modi to visit the United States, but Modi declined due to prior commitments. Instead, the two leaders spoke by phone, during which Modi invited Trump to India for the next Quad summit, which Trump accepted with enthusiasm.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Lone survivor Viswashkumar Ramesh discharged from hospital
content: Viswashkumar Ramesh, the lone survivor of the Air India AI-171 crash near Ahmedabad, was discharged from the hospital after six days. The British national, who lost his brother Ajaykumar in the disaster, recalled hearing strange noises and the pilot's distress call before the crash.

title: 'India will never accept mediation': PM Modi's clear message to Trump
content: Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri clarified that Prime Minister Modi firmly stated India's consistent rejection of third-party mediation, particularly concerning counterterrorism actions like Operation Sindoor in Pakistan. PM Modi emphasized to President Trump that discussions focused on India's anti-terror efforts and conveyed that India views terrorism as an actual war, not a proxy one, with full political unanimity on this stand.

title: Woman jumps off roof after being caught with lover; husband fears for his life
content: In Uttar Pradesh's Baghpat district, a married woman leaped from a hotel roof and fled after her husband allegedly discovered her with another man. Locals apprehended the alleged lover, Shobhit, and handed him over to the police. The husband, who followed his wife to the hotel after a counseling session, has filed a complaint, fearing for his safety.

title: ‚ÄòEverything on the table‚Äô: India eyes assurance Trump won‚Äôt impose additional tariffs
content: India seeks guarantees from the US against future tariffs as they finalize a bilateral trade agreement. India wants tariff stability, especially for labor-intensive sectors like leather and textiles. The goal is to secure preferential trade advantages through mutual duty reductions before the July 9 deadline.

title: 'You are the best': Meloni compliments PM Modi at G7 Summit - watch
content: The camaraderie between PM Modi and Italian PM Meloni, affectionately known as "Melodi," was a highlight at the G7 Summit in Canada. Their informal meeting, set against the backdrop of the Rocky Mountains, involved discussions on terrorism and global issues. A viral video captured Meloni complimenting Modi, saying, "You are the best.

title: Hyderabad's Begumpet Airport gets bomb threat; alerts sounded, search ops on
content: A bomb threat email triggered a security alert at Hyderabad's Begumpet Airport on Wednesday morning, prompting a thorough search operation. Police have confirmed that bomb disposal teams are currently scanning the airport and its surrounding areas to ensure safety. The Assistant Commissioner of Police, Begumpet, stated that the search is ongoing following the receipt of the threatening email.

title: 'Shocking': SC on Madras HC order to arrest ADGP in kidnapping case
content: The Supreme Court criticized the Madras High Court's order to arrest ADGP H M Jayaram in a kidnapping case, deeming it "shocking and demoralising." The court questioned the Tamil Nadu government about Jayaram's suspension and sought clarification on its revocation.

title: Monsoon mayhem in Gujarat: 18 dead in 2 days; Saurashtra flooded, rescue ops on
content: Heavy rains in Gujarat, particularly Saurashtra, caused 18 deaths since Monday. Most victims were struck by lightning. Normal life was disrupted in Rajkot, Amreli, Morbi, and Surendranagar. Overflowing rivers and dam releases led to alerts. Botad and Bhavnagar districts received extreme rainfall. Rescue operations were conducted for people trapped in floodwaters.

title: 'Posed as cousin to abduct him': UP man kills groom day before wedding
content: In Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, Mohd Saddam was arrested for allegedly murdering Nihal. Police said Saddam wanted to stop Nihal's wedding because he loved the bride-to-be. Saddam and an accomplice lured Nihal out and strangled him. Police identified Saddam from CCTV footage. Saddam confessed and led police to the body and the victim's phone.

title: IND vs ENG: What is it like facing Jasprit Bumrah? Ollie Pope reminisces
content: England's Ollie Pope acknowledges Jasprit Bumrah's exceptional skill, emphasizing the challenge of facing him across multiple series. Pope highlights the strategy of rotating strike to avoid Bumrah bowling consecutive deliveries and utilizing his full range of skills. Stuart Broad suggests the series outcome depends on Bumrah's fitness, with England hoping he doesn't play all five Tests.

title: PM Modi heads to Croatia after Canada visit - what's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has embarked on a historic visit to Croatia, marking the first time an Indian Prime Minister has visited the Balkan nation. Following his Canada visit, Modi is scheduled to meet with Croatian President Zoran Milanovic and Prime Minister Andrej Plenkovic to bolster bilateral ties.

title: Israel hits centrifuge site in Iran: Why its a big blow to Tehran's nuclear aims
content: Israeli military conducted extensive airstrikes on Iranian military infrastructure, including a centrifuge production site in Tehran, escalating the conflict between the two nations. The IDF targeted Iran's nuclear weapons development efforts and missile production industry, citing uranium enrichment beyond civilian needs. As casualties mount and missiles are exchanged, President Trump demands Iran's unconditional surrender, while Iran vows retaliation.

title: West moves away from China, Bangladesh - India‚Äôs apparel exports see big growth
content: India's apparel exports are experiencing robust growth, driven by Western buyers seeking alternatives to Bangladesh and China. A significant 11.3% year-on-year increase in May signals a recovery from post-pandemic stagnation. Duty advantages over China and political instability in Bangladesh are further fueling this surge, presenting a major opportunity for Indian manufacturers in the US market.

title: 'For 37 days ...': Cong demands all-party meet after Trump's call to PM Modi
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh urged PM Modi to convene an all-party meeting to address discrepancies between Indian and US accounts regarding discussions during the G7 Summit, particularly concerning Trump's mediation claims on India and Pakistan. Ramesh questioned PM Modi's silence and criticized Donald Trump's invitation to Pakistan's army chief Munir.

title: 'I don't care': Trump ignored intel Iran wasn't building nuclear weapon
content: US President Trump dismissed his intelligence chief's assessment that Iran wasn't building a nuclear weapon, aligning himself with Israel's Prime Minister Netanyahu. Despite Iran's claims of peaceful nuclear activities, concerns persist over its enriched uranium levels, prompting military actions by Israel and raising regional tensions. ‚Äã‚ÄãTrump is now weighing a possible direct attack on Iran‚Äôs underground nuclear site in Fordow.

title: Regime on edge: If Khamenei is slain, who will rule Iran?
content: Amidst escalating tensions with Israel and the loss of key advisors, questions arise about the future leadership of Iran. With Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei increasingly isolated, potential successors are being considered. Figures like his son, Mojtaba Khamenei, and influential officials such as Ali Asghar Hejazi are in the spotlight.

title: 'Liquor scam' probe: Ex-YSRCP MLA Chevireddy Bhaskar Reddy arrested in Bengaluru
content: Chevireddy Bhaskar Reddy, a close aide of Jagan Mohan Reddy and ex-Chandragiri MLA, was detained by SIT officials while attempting to travel to Colombo. He and co-accused Venkatesh Naidu have been taken to Vijayawada for questioning and are likely to be produced before the ACB court today.

title: IND vs ENG: Karun Nair recalls 2018 snub by Kohli and Shastri ‚Äî 'It felt like...'
content: After an eight-year wait, Karun Nair is on the verge of a Test comeback at Leeds. Once dropped and overlooked in 2018, the batter opens up on heartbreak, healing, and how his resilience has inspired even coach Gautam Gambhir.

title: Harry Kane leads Shapeshifters return in EA Sports FC 25
content: Shapeshifters is a new fan favorite for the program . the program features high overall ratings, meta-defining position changes and chemistry boosts . players getting special items as part of the program might benefit from new PlayStyles or Roles .

title: Stanton to be regular DH, Cubs hope to have Tucker back
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . Aaron nola of the Philadelphia Phillies hadn't missed any starts due to injury since 2017 . nola suffered a right ankle sprain in mid-May and had progressed to throwing bullpens in early June .

title: Malik Tillman shines as USMNT secures a much-needed win
content: usmNT beat Trinidad and Tobago 5-0 at PayPal Park on sunday . the men's national team kicked off their 2025 gold cup run with a 5-0 win . Mauricio Pochettino and his men will now face saudi arabia on june 5 .

title: A former champion returns to form against ranked competition
content: two former welterweight champions turned back the clock with wins at UFC Fight Night from Atlanta this past weekend . Kamaru Usman moves up three spots to no. 6 in the rankings after showing the division he still knows how to wrestle . the loss snapped a six-fight winning streak for Buckley .

title: Indie musician Aksomaniac on his track ‚ÄòKanmashi‚Äô and choosing music as a career
content: The 23-year-old independent artiste from Thiruvananthapuram on his new track espouses fluidity, dealing with self-love and self-exploration

title: Thermal imaging drones deployed at Gudalur forest division of Nilgiris to monitor elephants
content: The forest department said the initiative to use drones has been taken to minimise the number of negative human-elephant interactions in the region.

title: Air India plane crash: Insurers in a fix as both policyholders and nominees among dead
content: The task becomes difficult when both the insured individual and the nominee die, as in the case of air accidents, representatives of the insurance firms maintained.

content: Asked about the progress of construction of the capital Amaravati, Nara Lokesh told Jagdeep Dhankhar that works costing about ‚Çπ64,000 crore were going on in different stages at a brisk pace

content: The residents of Alipur had travelled to Iran for various reasons, including pursuing Islamic theological studies, medical education, pilgrimage, and business activities¬†

content: Calcutta High Court said the Centre is empowered to impose special conditions, restrictions and regulations, which have not been imposed in other States of the country

content: Jagan Mohan Reddy started from his Tadepalli residence in Guntur district at 9 a.m. and is on his way to Rentapalla village in Sattenapalli mandal in Palnadu district

content: While English is widely promoted, Indian languages are often neglected, Devendra Fadnavis told reporters in Dehu and maintained that disputes over languages are unnecessary.

content: Allahabad High Court stays final judgment in 2016 eviction case involving ex-MP Azam Khan until July 3, 2025

content: Bombay High Court has directed BCCI to pay ‚Çπ385.50 crore to KCPL and ‚Çπ153.34 crore to RSW along with interest  ¬†

title: Karnataka‚Äôs proposed 10-hour work shifts: What you need to know
content: The draft amendment to the Karnataka Shops and Commercial Establishment Act, 1961, seeks to increase work hours to 10 hours a day and 48 hours a week.

content: The outflow was increased consequent to rise in the rate of inflow into the reservoir, which was nearing its capacity

title: Keeladi excavation report of archaeologist Amarnath Ramakrishna: Why are Centre and T.N. government at loggerheads?
content: Keeladi (also spelt Keezhadi), located about 12 km southeast of Madurai, drew national attention after over 7,500 ancient artifacts believed to be from Sangam Age were unearthed. In 2014, Amarnath Ramakrishna, then the ASI‚Äôs Superintending Archaeologist, initiated excavations at the site, which was originally a coconut grove.

title: FASTag annual pass for private vehicles to be launched on August 15: Nitin Gadkari
content: The pass will be valid for one year from the date of activation or up to 200 trips, whichever comes first

title: PM must call all-party meeting upon his return to brief leaders on what he told Trump: Congress
content: The PM should have conveyed India's displeasure to reports that Pakistan Army Chief Gen Asim Munir would be having lunch with Donald Trump, Congress said

title: Nilambur bypoll in Kerala: Opposition UDF accuses LDF of stoking Islamophobia for Sangh Parivar votes

title: Semma!: How James Beard-winning chef Vijay Kumar is making Tamil cuisine international
